row.special_powers: [ { "type": "trait", "name": "THE SIZE I NEED TO BE", "description": "At the beginning of your turn, you may choose the Giant damage symbol or the Colossal damage symbol. Stranger possesses that combat symbol until your next turn." }, { "type": "attack", "name": "NO ONE KNOWS ME...
